statements: SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE speed > 60
SELECT id, vehicle_id, speed FROM TrafficData WHERE location = 'City A'
SELECT timestamp, speed FROM TrafficData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE speed < 50 ORDER BY speed ASC
SELECT id, location FROM TrafficData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM TrafficData GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING count(*) > 1;
SELECT id, location FROM TrafficData WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM TrafficData WHERE location LIKE '%highway%';
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE location = 'City Center' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM real_time_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, traffic_speed FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND traffic_speed > 50;
SELECT analysis_id, peak_hour FROM traffic_analysis ORDER BY peak_hour ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_analysis WHERE average_speed BETWEEN 40 AND 60;
SELECT vehicle_id, traffic_flow FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, traffic_speed, traffic_flow FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE traffic_speed > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM traffic_analysis WHERE average_speed > 60 AND peak_hour BETWEEN '2022-01-01 08:00:00' AND '2022-01-01 18:00:00';
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(traffic_speed) AS max_speed FROM real_time_traffic_data GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING max_speed > 70 ORDER BY max_speed DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, timestamp, average_speed FROM traffic_analysis ORDER BY average_speed ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM real_time_traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-01 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data
SELECT vehicle_id, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 50
SELECT timestamp, speed FROM traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT vehicle_type, manufacturer, model FROM vehicle_info WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car'
SELECT id, timestamp, congestion_level FROM traffic_analytics
SELECT * FROM traffic_analytics WHERE congestion_level='High'
SELECT vehicle_id, manufacturer, model FROM vehicle_info WHERE vehicle_type='Car' ORDER BY manufacturer ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles FROM vehicle_info
SELECT id, timestamp, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM traffic_data GROUP BY id HAVING AVG(speed) > 50
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM traffic_data;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 60;
SELECT location, direction FROM traffic_data WHERE vehicle_id = 'ABC123';
SELECT * FROM road_segments ORDER BY length DESC;
SELECT name, road_type FROM road_segments WHERE road_type = 'Highway';
SELECT * FROM traffic_data ORDER BY speed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM traffic_data WHERE direction = 'North' AND speed > 60;
SELECT location, AVG(speed) FROM traffic_data GROUP BY location ORDER BY AVG(speed) DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) FROM traffic_data WHERE speed < 40 GROUP BY location ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras;
SELECT location, city, latitude, longitude FROM traffic_cameras WHERE city='New York';
SELECT camera_id, location FROM traffic_cameras ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE incident_type='Accident';
SELECT description, timestamp FROM traffic_incidents WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras WHERE city='New York';
SELECT location, latitude, longitude FROM traffic_cameras WHERE city='Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM traffic_incidents WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT MAX(avg_speed), MIN(vehicle_count) FROM traffic_flow WHERE camera_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT traffic_pattern, COUNT(*) FROM traffic_analytics GROUP BY traffic_pattern;
